channel.title: 300's Spartan Sword [this is sparta!] all comments will be answered after school
channel.description:
Well, a couple of days ago 300 was on TV and I liked the design of the sword so I used Metaseq to make it.
Copy this into you're comment if you fancy 300 [code][this is sparta!][/code]
[IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/SpartanSword2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/SpartanSword.jpg[/img]

item.title: 300's Spartan Sword [this is sparta!] all comments will be answered after school
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“Range This, post:17, topic:282112”][quote author=wayzey link=topic=372758.msg2813129#msg2813129 date=1244124793]

[quote author=Range This link=topic=372758.msg2813061#msg2813061 date=1244118116]

Yes, I can actually. I have been working on a model for a few hours and it’s already better.

Evidence?
[/quote]Once I’ve finished I’ll post, so don’t bother saying I suck because you will be crying in the end.

I don’t judge like you, you shouldn’t assume everyone does. I make fair judgments and I give criticism, I rarely insult people because of what they have made. Remember that I don’t judge based on the person who made it but the model itself.
[/quote]Does it look like I honestly give a shit about your life?[/quote]

Do you really think we give a shit about your life?
OMG CIRCULAR ARGUMENT PWNAGE! I MUST BE SO CREATIVE TO COME UP WITH THIS.
[center] Take a chill pill man.[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: 300's Spartan Sword [this is sparta!] all comments will be answered after school

To be honest it looks ugly

post your model already I wanna see it…and tabby its not bad could use more work[quote=“SilentCJ, post:8, topic:282112”]This is good, it’s a nice smooth shape, i think it needs a little more depth though? Looks a little skinny.
Just scale it vertically.[/quote]
